title: Blindsided
description: GeorgeI went on the blind date to get my friends off my back. I wasn't prepared for Finn. Hot, famous, take-my-breath-away Finn. But no amount of chemistry with a movie star changes the fact that I'm a widow. That my heart is lost forever. And if Finn needs something, too? That's not my problem. Except... I can't stop thinking about him.FinnI thought LA could offer me no more surprises. I’ve seen it all. The good, the bad and the plastic. Turns out, LA had one last surprise for me. George was everything I knew I shouldn’t want, but I couldn’t make myself stay away from her. The only thing standing in my way? Her.
author: Holly Mortimer
